languages.text: "Годы я провел в учении, а затем прошел сквозь мрачные Врата Моркаи, поклонился обеим его головам на рунных камнях и ступил в долину грез. Что видел я там, не спрашивай — то между мной и Волком смерти. Рунные жрецы рыскали в моей душе, но признали ее нетронутой скверной. Вернувшись, я был причащен из Чаши Вульфена. Волчья спираль вошла в мою кровь, и агония трансформации преобразила мое тело на манер зверя, а разум утопила в темных пучинах кровавого безумия".

traits.locale_text: "Годы я провел в учении, а затем прошел сквозь мрачные Врата Моркаи, поклонился обеим его головам на рунных камнях и ступил в долину грез. Что видел я там, не спрашивай — то между мной и Волком смерти. Рунные жрецы рыскали в моей душе, но признали ее нетронутой скверной. Вернувшись, я был причащен из Чаши Вульфена. Волчья спираль вошла в мою кровь, и агония трансформации преобразила мое тело на манер зверя, а разум утопила в темных пучинах кровавого безумия".
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."
languages.original_text: "Годы я провел в учении, а затем прошел сквозь мрачные Врата Моркаи, поклонился обеим его головам на рунных камнях и ступил в долину грез. Что видел я там, не спрашивай — то между мной и Волком смерти. Рунные жрецы рыскали в моей душе, но признали ее нетронутой скверной. Вернувшись, я был причащен из Чаши Вульфена. Волчья спираль вошла в мою кровь, и агония трансформации преобразила мое тело на манер зверя, а разум утопила в темных пучинах кровавого безумия".

As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “我花了很多年接受训练。之后，我通过了恐怖的莫凯之门，朝莫凯两个头颅前的符文石鞠了一躬，进入了梦境之谷。至于我在梦境中看到了什么，就别多问了，那是我和殁狼之间的事情。符文牧师找到了我的灵魂，发现它并没有遭到腐化，于是我便回来了。我饮下了狼人之杯，狼之螺旋进入了我的血液。转变过程充满了痛苦，我的身体被扭曲成了野兽的样子，而我的思想则被淹没在嗜血的黑暗深处。”
languages.original_text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."

traits.locale_text: “我花了很多年接受训练。之后，我通过了恐怖的莫凯之门，朝莫凯两个头颅前的符文石鞠了一躬，进入了梦境之谷。至于我在梦境中看到了什么，就别多问了，那是我和殁狼之间的事情。符文牧师找到了我的灵魂，发现它并没有遭到腐化，于是我便回来了。我饮下了狼人之杯，狼之螺旋进入了我的血液。转变过程充满了痛苦，我的身体被扭曲成了野兽的样子，而我的思想则被淹没在嗜血的黑暗深处。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: «Pasé años entrenando antes de atravesar la terrible Puerta de Morkai, inclinándome sobre las piedras rúnicas ante sus dos cabezas y entrando al valle de los sueños. No me pregunte lo que vi allí; eso queda entre el Lobo de la Muerte y yo. Los sacerdotes rúnicos estudiaron mi cuerpo y comprobaron que estaba libre de corrupción. Al volver, participé de la Copa del Wulfen. La Canis Helix entró en mi sangre y una transformación agónica convirtió mi cuerpo en algo bestial mientras sumía mi mente en la sed de sangre más oscura».
languages.original_text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."

traits.locale_text: «Pasé años entrenando antes de atravesar la terrible Puerta de Morkai para inclinarme sobre las piedras rúnicas ante sus dos cabezas y entrar al valle de los sueños. No me pregunte lo que vi allí; eso queda entre el Lobo de la Muerte y yo. Los sacerdotes rúnicos estudiaron mi cuerpo y comprobaron que estaba libre de corrupción. Al volver, participé de la Copa del Wulfen. La Canis Helix entró en mi sangre y una transformación agónica convirtió mi cuerpo en algo bestial mientras sumía mi mente en la sed de sangre más oscura».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は何年も修行に費やし、そして恐ろしきモルカイの門をくぐり、その両頭の前にあるルーン石の上で一礼し、夢の谷へと歩を進めた。そこで何を見たかについては、俺に聞かないでほしい…それは俺と死の狼との間だけに秘められたるものだ。ルーンプリーストたちは俺の魂を調べたが、腐敗していないことがわかった。俺は帰還し、狂狼の盃を飲んだ。牙狼遺伝子が俺の血に入り、変容の苦しみが俺の体を獣のように変え、俺の心は血への渇望の暗い深みに溺れた」
languages.original_text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は何年も修行に費やし、そして恐ろしきモルカイの門をくぐり、その両頭の前にあるルーン石の上で一礼し、夢の谷へと歩を進めた。そこで何を見たかについては、俺に聞かないでほしい…それは俺と死の狼との間だけに秘められたるものだ。ルーンプリーストたちは俺の魂を調べたが、腐敗していないことがわかった。俺は帰還し、狂狼の盃を飲んだ。牙狼遺伝子が俺の血に入り、変容の苦しみが俺の体を獣のように変え、俺の心は血への渇望の暗い深みに溺れた」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Ich wurde jahrelang ausgebildet, bevor ich durch das grauenhafte Portal des Morkai trat, mich auf den Runensteinen vor seinen beiden Häuptern verneigte und in das Tal der Träume trat. Und was ich dort gesehen habe ... fragt mich nicht. Das ist eine Sache zwischen mir und dem Todeswolf. Die Runenpriester haben meine Seele durchkämmt, aber keine Spur von Verderbtheit gefunden. Ich bin zurückgekehrt und habe aus dem Becher der Wulfen getrunken. Der Canis Helix ging in mein Blut über und die Pein der Transformation verwandelte meinen Körper in den eines Untiers. Mein Verstand wurde in den dunkelsten Tiefen des Blutdursts ertränkt."
languages.original_text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."

traits.locale_text: "Jahrelang wurde ich ausgebildet. Dann trat ich durch das grauenhafte Portal des Morkai, verneigte mich auf den Runensteinen vor seinen beiden Häuptern und ging in das Tal der Träume. Und was ich dort gesehen habe ... fragt mich nicht. Das ist eine Sache zwischen mir und dem Todeswolf. Die Runenpriester haben meine Seele durchkämmt, aber keine Spur von Verderbtheit gefunden. Ich bin zurückgekehrt und habe aus dem Becher der Wulfen getrunken. Der Canis Helix ging in mein Blut über und die Pein der Transformation verwandelte meinen Körper in den eines Untiers. Mein Verstand wurde in den dunkelsten Tiefen des Blutdursts ertränkt."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « J'ai passé des années à m'entraîner, je suis passé par la terrible porte de Morkaï pour me prosterner devant les pierres runiques recouvertes de ses deux têtes, avant de pénétrer dans la vallée des rêves. Quant à ce que j'y ai vu, je préfère ne pas en parler. C'est une histoire entre le Loup des Morts et moi. Les prêtres des runes ont mis mon âme à nu, mais n'y ont trouvé aucune trace de corruption. Je suis revenu et j'ai participé à la Coupe du Wulfen. Le Canis Helix a infiltré mon sang, et l'agonie de la transformation a changé mon corps pour qu'il ressemble à celui d'une bête, tandis que mon esprit s'est retrouvé noyé dans les profondeurs obscures de la soif de sang. »
languages.original_text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."

traits.locale_text: « J'ai passé des années à m'entraîner, jusqu'à passer par la terrible porte de Morkaï pour me prosterner devant les pierres runiques recouvertes de ses deux têtes, avant de pénétrer dans la vallée des rêves. Quant à ce que j'y ai vu, je préfère ne pas en parler. C'est une histoire entre le Loup des Morts et moi. Les prêtres des runes ont mis mon âme à nu, mais n'y ont trouvé aucune trace de corruption. Je suis revenu et j'ai participé à la Coupe du Wulfen. Le Canis Helix a infiltré mon sang, et l'agonie de la transformation a changé mon corps pour qu'il ressemble à celui d'une bête, tandis que mon esprit s'est retrouvé noyé dans les profondeurs obscures de la soif de sang. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."

languages.text: "Yıllarımı eğitime verdim, sonra da Haşmetli Morkai Geçidi'nden geçip çift başındaki rün taşları önünde eğilip rüyalar vadisine doğru yürüdüm. Orada ne gördüğümü bana sorma. Benimle Ölüm Kurdu arasındaki bir mevzudur. Rün Rahipleri ruhumu temizlese de hiç yozlaşma bulamadılar. Geri dönüp Börü Kadehi'nden içtim. Canis Helix kanıma karıştı; dönüşüm ızdırabı, bedenimi canavara benzer kıldı. Zihnim ise kan arzusunun karanlık derinliklerinde boğuldu."
languages.original_text: "I spent years in training before I passed through the dreaded Gate of Morkai, bowed on the rune stones before both his heads, and walked into the valley of dreams. As for what I saw there, do not ask me — that is between me and the Death Wolf. The Rune Priests scoured my soul but found it untouched by corruption. I returned and I partook of the Cup of Wulfen. The Canis Helix entered my blood, and the agony of transformation changed my body to resemble that of a beast, and my mind was drowned in the dark depths of bloodlust."

traits.locale_text: "Haşmetli Morkai Geçidi'nden geçip çift başındaki rün taşları önünde eğilmeden ve rüyalar vadisine doğru yürümeden önce yıllarımı eğitime verdim. Orada ne gördüğümü bana sorma. Benimle Ölüm Kurdu arasındaki bir mevzu. Rün Rahipleri ruhumu temizledi ama hiç yozlaşma bulamadılar. Geri dönüp Börü Kadehi'nden içtim. Canis Heliz kanıma karıştı ve dönüşüm ızdırabı, bedenimi canavara benzeyen bir hâle getirdi. Zihnim ise kan arzusunun karanlık derinliklerinde boğuldu."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
